Description: Rim sherd of Attic pottery lip-cup; interior glazed black; exterior reserved with narrow black band below offset of lip; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.253, with which it may make a point join.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0568) (Phase 1)
